Description: Join us on Wednesday 13 March, as we welcome John Kehoe to CIS for a breakfast conversation. This event will be hosted by our Executive Director, Tom Switzer. The Australian economy has performed better than most economists predicted a year ago. However, probe deeper and things look disturbing. We face not just a productivity drought, but runaway government spending programs that, left unchecked, will lead to budget deficits and stagnation or decline in living standards. Australia, as Treasury‚Äôs Intergenerational Report warned last year, will become older, more indebted, spend big on social services, grow slower, have weaker income growth and tax working-age people more over coming decades. Savings need to be found, but where? Australia is now one of the biggest government spenders on disability in the world, according to the OECD ‚Äì more than double the UK and Canada, and on track to go past the European welfare states of Iceland, Finland and Sweden. The National Disability and Insurance Scheme, which is projected to blow past $100 billion a year, needs to be curtailed. But how? John Kehoe is economics editor of the Australian Financial Review and a former Washington correspondent. Tom Switzer is the Executive Director at the Centre for Independent Studies, and formerly hosted Between the Lines on the ABC‚Äôs Radio National. He is also a regular contributor to The Australian, the Australian Financial Review and Sky News Australia. Can't watch live? Watch it on our YouTube or listen on SoundCloud, at a later stage!
Title: Canberra‚Äôs fiscal ticking bomb
Subtitle: Join us at CIS for a breakfast conversation with John Kehoe, exploring the challenges facing the Australian economy, hosted by Tom Switzer.

Description: This half-day seminar will feature the following topics: Session one - The future of legal client experience (CX): how AI is transforming law Facilitator: Jacqui Jubb, Partner, Law Quarter Session 2 - 10 immediate actions that generate revenue and cash Facilitator: Alistair Marshall, Founder, Professional Services Business Development This session will focus on how to counteract the effects of the pandemic and demonstrate what it takes to stand out in an increasingly competitive and noisy marketplace. Many firms suffer from a lack of awareness, underperforming websites, no real point of difference from the competition and personnel who consider themselves professionals rather than marketers or worse salespeople.Session participants will learn how to engage potential clients without sounding confused or bland and how to build trust and credibility, so they become the provider of choice over time. Key points include: - Why you should change your attitude and behaviour to business development.- The profit model all successful businesses must master.- How the answers to 3 simple questions can change your financial life.- The ‚Äòmust implement‚Äô ideas to drive revenue growth in the new modern world. Session 3 - Lawyers: gladiators or problem solvers? What is in the clients best interests? Facilitator: Steve Mark AM, Principal, Creative Consequences This session will cover: - Is lawyering all about 'winning'? - Who decides the clients best interest - the lawyer or the client? - The ethics of negotiation - A few First Nations Principles
Title: Compulsory CPD essentials - AI & CX, ethics, generating revenue

Description: Allow yourself to be seen for who you are with a small group of like minded souls. Soul Space Circle is space to connect and share from an open heart with a group of like minded souls. A space to let go of all the stories and any dramas of the day and unwind for a couple of hours or so with presence not pretence. It's a space to open your mind to a new perspective and connect with your soul and the souls of other like-minded beings as we tune into our authenticiy and intuition. We explore a different theme each time. Theme: Being Seen The evening is divided into 3 main parts: 1. Sharing of inspirational self love cards 2. Meditation (in 2 parts: body scan to relax the mind & body followed by a guided meditation intuitively based on the theme) 3. Pairing/connection exercises - asking and responding to questions based on the theme, usually using the benefit of hindsight, and gaining insights through your reflections in others We will consider these types of questions: What does being seen mean to you? How do you prefer to be seen by others and the world? Do you always want to be seen or do you sometimes prefer to stay hidden? Does the way others see you affect the way you see yourself? If you want to be seen for who you are inside how do you portray yourself to others and does it align? If you want to be the change you wish to see in the world how are you allowing yourself to be seen? What if you could choose whether to be seek or not to be seen, visible or invisible, in each moment? What would you choose? There are no right or wrong answers, only what feels true for you in each moment. You can expect to gain greater awareness and insights through the reflections of others and yourself. Date: Wednesday 13 March 2024 Time: 7.30pm start (arrive from 7.15pm ) to 9.15pm Location: The Authentic Living Centre Address: Level 2, 113-115 Oxford St (Cnr Oxford & Crown st) Darlinghurst Tickets: Earlybird tickets (until 6 March): $25 / 2 for $40 / $20 concession Latebird tickets (from 7 March): $30 / 2 for $50 / $25 concession Includes light snacks, homemade bliss balls, herbal teas & filtered water. Limited to 12 people Come with an open mind and leave with an open heart and some soulful connections. Attendees will receive an outline and links and will be invited to a private Facebook group, to connect and share with other previous attendees for ongoing support outside the space. Facilitator: Maria Lambi has been hosting Soul Space Circles consistently since 2017, creating a safe space for open minded and open hearted beings to connect with themselves and with each other at the soul level. Maria has also led meditation sessions in a corporate setting, both online and in person and is passionate about bringing people together and helping them find their centre, integrating over a decade of self awareness practices. Maria currently offers Soul Space Circles twice a month usually on the 2nd Wednesday and last Tuesday of each month. Maria also features as a meditation teacher on Insight Timer where you can find some of her meditations. If you have any questions about this event or would love to attend but are struggling financially, you can contact Maria: Facebook/Instagram: Maria Lambi / maria.lambi.33 Email: maria.lambi@gmail.com Phone: 0402 036 562 Testimonials:‚ÄúIt was a lovely evening of relaxation, mindfulness, contemplation and discovery of insights.I am grateful and had a great night‚Äôs sleep following the session and woke up feeling content.‚Äù - Sandra"Maria has set up a very safe space with a focus on meditation and connection in the group of like minded others. She uses her wisdom and knowledge to lead a body scan to hone into the body with a guided meditation to link to body wisdoms. She provides Self Love cards to help identify your feelings at the time and opportunity is given to feedback on this powerful tool. A second meditation is offered based on a theme in the session. The opportunity is also given to discuss this in pairs or as a group to get clarity on these. Maria provides heartfelt sessions to use the tools to know ourselves better in this busy, crazy time.‚Äù - Jill"Recently I enjoyed a beautiful evening at the Soul Space Circle facilitated by the wonderful Maria Lambi.I've known Maria since 2011 and have watched her devotion to truly knowing herself and diving deep through different modalities.The space Maria held was safe and open to explore myself and deepen my awareness. I recommend this event to anyone wanting to be held in compassionate listening to know themselves and remove the layers of who they are not.Thank you Maria for the amazing commitment to yourself and others that you have."Jane ThorpeAlignment Coach"The Soul Space Circle is a gentle reminder to tune in to your spirit, your feelings, your self. Maria brings a softness and warmth to the space. Her gentle delivery has you feeling safe. Paired with her insights and calming energy, Soul Space Circle is an amazing way to nourish your spirit in the midst of the working week."IreneEmilyDesigner & Circle Facilitator
Title: Being Seen - Soul Space Connection Sharing Circle
Subtitle: Come join an intimate gathering of souls where we connect, share, and allow ourselves to be seen for who we truly are in a safe space.

Description: Special session: Ease-in MeditationSpeaker: Ajahn Yiu (Joining online from Hong Kong)Wed 13 March | 7:00-9:00pm AESTLocation: In person at Western Sydney University (74 Rickard Rd, Bankstown City Campus), Room 1.4.34 on level 4 or Online (Zoom link below)Cost: Free Click here to register ! Ajahn Yiu will discuss the method of Ease-In Meditation, lead a meditation session, and then answer questions. More details about the session will be provided. About the speaker: Ajahn Yiu is the current instructor of Hong Kong Theravada Meditation Society and has been ordained for more than ten years. In 2005, he completed Master‚Äôs degree in Buddhist Studies at HKU. In 2011, Ajahn ordained as a Bhikkhu under the guidance of Luang Por Ganha in Thailand. In 2020 Ajahn Yiu started guiding meditation classes with the blessings of Luang Por Ganha. In 2022, Ajahn Yiu returned to Hong Kong from Thailand and was invited to be the meditation instructor for Hong Kong Theravada Meditation Society and Jing Nian Hang Limited. In 2023, he established Maggapa·π≠ipadƒÅ Meditation Centre on Lamma Island, Hong Kong.He is rigorous in his precepts, profound in his practical training, and well versed in the Buddhist scriptures.He is proficient in Chinese, Thai, Cantonese, and English, and knows early Buddhist texts in Pali. His research and empirical study of Buddhism is rigorous and professional. Based on his previous educational background, combined with his understanding of Buddhism, Ajahn Yiu has a unique insight into the fields of modern psychology and spiritual therapy. He is compassionate and cheerful, humorous, amiable, humble, and low-key, and good at skillful teaching. The closer you get to Ajahn Yiu, the more you can feel the light and compassion in his heart. Hybrid event: Attend the session in person, or online by clicking on this link to access the session: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83506489824?pwd=cmpNQ1ljSmFVYURLWVN1dWllYUN1dz09 Alternatively, you can dial in from your telephone (call charges apply): +61 2 8015 6011 | Meeting ID: 835 0648 9824| Passcode: 718905
Title: Special session: Ease-in Meditation

Description: Join us on Wednesday 13th March for HUBB Conversations ‚ÄòView from the HUBBsters‚Äô with panellist Maria Issaris from audiobooksradio, Richard Eaves from Nth Degree, and Wayne Obrien from Mysocial.ai. The topic for the evening is ‚ÄúCan Ai be authentic?‚Äù, with Richard Cornally as moderator to guide the conversation. About Maria Issaris Maria is the founder of audiobooksradio (ABR), one of the first and most successful audiobook production companies serving self-published and indie-published books in Australia. ABR has won the tender for a government-funded Anthology 3 years in a row - over 300 authors, 25 narrators and over 20 different languages. Around the same time she founded ABR, Maria was producing a Radio Program for new writers called New Voices which was shortlisted as best new program at the CBAA Awards 2020. It paired up established artists with new writers - and entailed a 'blind review' of a section of work being read to the 'celebrity'. Maria started a writer's group during this time (The Inner West Writers Group) while writing her own novel. The group is now almost 850 writers strong. All this was building on a career in the corporate world (Qantas, Nine Network, the public service) and print journalism. About Richard Eaves Richard has been a digital agency director since 2015, helping hundreds of businesses of all shapes and sizes to generate new business and build their brands on the internet. He is the Founder and CEO of Nth Degree. Combining industry-leading SEO, UX/UI web design, high-performance web development, and paid advertising on the search engines, Nth Degree‚Äôs service offerings are built entirely around attracting and converting customers from Google. A hands-on SEO Specialist by trade, Richard can offer both high-level strategic planning and specific technical recommendations across all website-related disciplines. Richard is HUBB‚Äôs SEO Expert. About Wayne O‚ÄôBrien Wayne comes from a diverse background having spent 20+ years working across advertising, media, and marketing. This has included virtually all touchpoints online and offline in markets around the world. The common thread through this career has been the focus on helping people thrive and achieve their goals. After seeing the benefits that professional social media outreach can provide individuals and businesses alike, Wayne set about developing a platform that makes it easier to grow your reach and influence online. Wayne is the Co-Founder & Director of mysocial.ai, a platform that has been built on the philosophy of empowering professionals and organizations to amplify their sales potential through professional social media such as LinkedIn. Wayne is HUBB's LinkedIn and AI Expert. Event Schedule 16:30 ‚Äì Arrival and registration (welcome drinks and canapes) 17:00 ‚Äì HUBB Conversations ‚ÄòView from the HUBBsters‚Äô with audience participation 18:15 to 19:15 ‚Äì Keep the conversations going with post-event drinks WOBSX members are welcome to HUBB events as a guest. If this is your first interaction with HUBB, please contact Rachel Lock (rachel.lock@hubb.sydney) before registering. Current HUBB community participants and their guests will be preferred as there is a quota for total attendees. HUBB reserves the right to cancel your registration if you purchase a HUBB Participant or WOBSX Guest ticket without first contacting HUBB. We look forward to seeing you there!
Title: HUBB Conversations 'View from the HUBBsters: Can Ai be authentic?'
Subtitle: With panellists Maria Issaris from audiobooksradio, Richard Eaves from Nth Degree, and Wayne Obrien from Mysocial.ai.

Description: Aggregated Turnover TD 2023/5 ‚Äì relating to the calculation of aggregated turnover, with a focus on defining what constitutes a ‚Äòconnected entity‚Äô.This is particularly important for those small to medium-sized entities that have a shareholder base that is insufficiently diverse or several parties may be related. A ‚Äòconnected entity‚Äô would typically be any entity that owns, or has the right to acquire ownership, 40% of voting power (similar rules for non-company entities). However, the Commissioner‚Äôs discretion can be sought where the control % is less than 50%. The TD explores various scenarios where control could be determined to be held by another entity. Associated Entities TA 2023/4 ‚Äì this TA explores several key concepts: Chris is a Director in the Sydney Tax team focusing on the R&D and Government Incentives space. He has over 12 years‚Äô experience advising clients in a range of industries, including Software and IT, Manufacturing, Property and Construction, Food and Agribusiness, and Life Sciences. His strength lies in his tax controversy experience, ranging from significant transactions reviews, complex cross-border corporate tax issues and dispute litigation. Chris works with a variety of businesses, ranging from small to medium private companies, through to ASX100 listed entities. Details: Notes:
Title: 13 March 2024 | Hybrid | R&D Incentive Program TD 2023/5 and TA 2023/4
Subtitle: Christopher from BDO will conduct a presentation on R&D Incentive Program w Aggregated Turnover TD 2023/5 and Associated Entities TA 2023/4

Description: Meeting every Wednesday at Kensington Park Community Centre, our  Supported Playgroup is like no other.  Its aim is to:  Our educators are passionate about providing nurturing experiences for each unique family, integrating a deep respect for diversity. LTSAE Screening at Playgroups At our Supported Playgroups we offer developmental monitoring called Learn the Signs. Act Early (LTSAE). All staff are trained in this and have a background in children‚Äôs development. If you have any concerns regarding your child‚Äôs development, please inform one of our staff members and we can sit down, have a chat, and discuss your concerns. If needed, we can then begin a referral process.What is Learn the Signs. Act Early (LTSAE)?- LTSAE is an evidence-informed program developed by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) that aims to increase both parent-engaged developmental monitoring of all children‚Äôs development and early action on possible concerns. Here at SECC, we are here to support you and your family, so please reach out if you have any questions at all. Each session is $3 per family. WHAT: Each week we will structured and unstructured developmental activities for the children and their carers to get involved in. Morning tea will be provided. WHERE: Hall 1, Kensington Park Community Centre, 1 Day Lane, Kensington (following safe COVID practices).  WHO: Children 0-5 yrs and their parents/ carers .  * Please note we are only able to accept families for this playgroup who live in the Bayside, Randwick, City of Sydney, Woollahra and Waverley LGAs.  *If you are a new family to our services, you are required to complete our online registration form one time here. *If you cannot make it, please let us know as soon as possible so we can make your spot available to another family. Spaces do fill up quickly.  Please note the following:  - We are unable to refund your ticket if you contact us after the playgroup has commenced (i.e. after 10am on the day).  - We are unable to transfer your ticket to another day/week.  - If you are unable to attend and would like a refund, please phone 7903 0607 prior to the playgroup commencing. Enquiries:  Sarah Neville Visit: bit.ly/SECCprograms or email familysupport2@secc.sydney Tel: 02 7903 0607 ______________________________________________________________________________ South Eastern Community Connect Frequently Asked Questions How will I be informed if a session or program is cancelled? If you have booked for a program, you will be contacted via phone or email prior to the start time.  How can I get a refund? If you can no longer attend the program, you can cancel your ticket via Eventbrite. If you do this before the program start time you will be given a refund by us using Eventbrite. We can‚Äôt offer refunds if you cancel after the session has started. How can I find out more about SECC Programs? To find out about other SECC Programs and Services, go to secc.sydney/events or you can sign up for our Newsletter via the website secc.sydney  How do I fill out an enrolment form? You can either fill this out online prior to attending or a digital or paper form can be filled out at the program location. Please allow 5 minutes to complete the form. Will there be toilet facilities available? Yes, there are toilets available including an accessible bathroom. Is the location accessible? Yes, there is a ramp at the main entrance of the location. Do I need to book online for programs, or can I just turn up? We encourage you to book online. If you are having trouble doing this, contact us for assistance on 02 7903 0607. You may drop in without a booking for certain programs including Tai Chi, Movement for Wellbeing, Social Art Space and Social Painting. Do you have holiday programs? All our programs operate on a termly basis and don‚Äôt take place during the school holidays. Can I attend programs if I am located outside of the LGAs you service? Unfortunately, our programs are only offered to residents located in the following Local Government Areas (LGAs): City of Sydney, Randwick, Waverley, Woollahra and Bayside.  When will the doors open/close for evening classes after 4pm? The Hub closes at 4pm Monday to Friday. For evening groups, the doors will open again 15 minutes before the start time and close 15 minutes after the start time. How can I pay? You will need to pay online for Playgroups prior to attending. For other paid programs you can pay when you arrive, either in cash or using our card machine. When does each playgroup session go on sale? Sessions go on sale the week prior at 11.30am on the assigned playgroup day. i.e. 10 October will go on sale on 3 October at 11.30am Are there nappy changing facilities? Nature Play - No change facilities, Eastlakes - Change mat on floor/steps of stage for use, Kensington Park - Yes, Disabled toilets with changing facility, Tote Park - Change mat on floor/table for use, Messy - Yes, In disabled toilet in the hall.  Will food and drink be provided? We will provide a small snack during the playgroup. Can I bring my child‚Äôs sibling to the playgroup if they are not in the age range of the group?  No, unfortunately children who attend must be within the specified age range.   Does a parent or carer need to stay while the playgroup is taking place? Yes, an adult parent or carer needs to be at the playgroup accompanying their child at all times.
Title: Kensington Park Playgroup (0-5 year olds) Term 1, Week 5
Subtitle: Children 0-5 yrs and their parents/carers are all welcome to attend our Supported Playgroup in Kensington on Wednesdays.

Description: Beginning Wednesday, February 21st, you can join us for an 8-week Afro Drumming Workshop taught by Rick Kugler. With over 30 years of musical experience, Rick has participated in various bands and ensembles; as well as having extensive experience in teaching music. Rick offers percussion workshops designed to inform, interest, and entertain. He is a highly motivated session drummer/percussionist with a superb musical ear and incredible ability for improvisation. He has performed live and also recorded his music, as well as performing with top international artists, including Ricky Martin (The Voice), and Seal (The Voice) just to name a few. During the workshop, a dance part is also integrated before and during the set; percussion rhythms and interaction with the group will be accompanied by a female dancer
Title: Afro Drumming Workshop
Subtitle: Join us for an interactive and entertaining Afro Drumming Workshop led by Rick Kugler. This workshop runs for 8 weeks beginning on 21st Feb.

Description: Return safely to exercise with your bub and meet other mums whilst having a great workout. In a supported and welcoming environment, improve cardio fitness, work on tone and strength, and build up core strength. Open to all, this class is ideal for new mums returning to exercise. Make sure you bring along a towel or exercise/yoga mat, water bottle and some soft toys to entertain bub. Always consult your GP or medical practitioner before undertaking exercise. Every Mum deserves this! It is self care, community, connection and so so important for mental health that you look after you too.

Description: Transform your lunch break in the park into an enriching journey with ancient martial arts. Our Kalari Workshop combines focused body movement and conditioning with mental agility and mindfulness, offering a complete mind-body revitalization outdoors in the Royal Botanical Park. Why Kalaripayattu? Kalaripayattu is more than martial arts; it's a holistic approach to well-being. Here are the benefits you will tap into during our workshop: Enhanced Flexibility: Learn movements that improve the elasticity of your muscles and joints. Improved Strength & Stamina: Kalari practices build core strength and cardiovascular health. Mental Clarity: The focused techniques promote a meditative state of mind, reducing stress and enhancing concentration. Self-Defense Skills: Gain confidence with self-defense tactics rooted in ancient wisdom. Cultural Immersion: Connect with the rich traditions and history that shape this fascinating art form. What You‚Äôll Learn: Basic stances and footwork that form the foundation of Kalaripayattu Introduction to body control and movement synchronization Breathing techniques to enhance energy flow and mental focus Simple yet effective strikes and kicks that embody the grace and power of Kalari The art of mindful movement and its application in daily life Workshop Details: No prior martial arts experience necessary Those who already practice yoga will find these practices as a buildup to the foundation to learn Kalari Instruction tailored to individual needs within the small group A peaceful and inspiring outdoor setting perfect for practice Secure Your Spot: Spaces are limited to four to maintain an intimate setting for optimal learning and attention. Reserve your place now and take the first step on a transformative journey with Kalaripayattu.
Title: CBD Lunch Time Outdoor Fitness: Kalari Workshop
Subtitle: Elevate your lunch break outdoors with our Kalari Workshop: body conditioning, mental focus, and ancient martial arts in the park

Description: Realign and rebalance down-regulation breathwork Do you want to slow down a racing mind? Do you want to improve your sleep quality, heart health and digestion? Do you feel disconnected from your body? Do you want to allow you body to move into a completely connected, clear minded state? If so, join me for this down-regulation breathwork class this Wednesday, in person in the beautiful Coogee Yoga Studio (135e Brook St, Coogee). This session will run from 20:00- 21:00. During this session, we will engage in mindful body checkins and mindful movement ahead of engaging in various breathing practices. Science shows that pairing mindful movement with breathwork has profound positive effects on the body. Let's move our bodies and minds into completely at one state, facilitating improved sleep quality, better emotional regulation, enhanced self-awareness and greater control over stress levels. Please arrive 5 minutes prior to class beginning, to allow yourself to wind down in this tranquil setting. Looking forward to seeing you there! Chloe x
Title: Realign and rebalance (functional breathing class)
Subtitle: Get ready to feel inner balance and peace through breath. Realigning body and mind through breath.

Description: Join Sky Rivers for an immersive shamanic sound bath and Kundalini Activation for energy healing, transformation and spiritual awakening. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû What happens during the session? You will lie down on your yoga mat and close your eyes. Sky Rivers, master practitioner of energy medicine, will take you on an immersive shamanic sound journey and Kundalini Activation for energy healing, transformation and spiritual awakening. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû What is Kundalini Activation? Kundalini Activation is a powerful energy activation process whereby Sky works on your chakras and energy field to activate Kundalini energy within you. In this process, your chakras are being cleansed and balanced. As you release energetic blockages from your body and energy field, you may experience spontaneous physical movement, tingling or heat in certain areas of your body. You may also experience powerful emotional releases that bring profound cognitive insight and positive change. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû What is a Shamanic Sound Bath? Sky Rivers works with music and shamanic sound frequencies to guide you into heightened states of awareness whereby you journey within to receive powerful insights and visions. Combining shamanic sound journeys with Kundalini activation initiates healing on all levels of the energy body, which enhances your physical, mental, emotional and spiritual well-being. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû The Benefits of Kundalini Activation When Kundalini energy is activated, your body begins to undergo a potent cleansing process where limiting beliefs, suppressed emotions and stuck energy are released from your body and energy field. The negative self-perception that people often hold is replaced with a more positive self-image. Kundalini energy also strengthens the body, enhances productivity, heightens awareness, expands consciousness, sharpens intuition, and ultimately enriches your life, encompassing wealth, health, and relationships. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû What Clients say - How Kundalini Activation impacts them & their week "The past few weeks have opened me up like I could have never imagined; daily life has become a beautiful and blissful experience. This newfound energy that surges through the body pulls me into the moment and opens me up to the immense intensity of experience that was perhaps before overlooked. I feel a sense of unity with others and the environment as I move about my day. I feel so content in daily life." - Jay Logan "During my most recent session, I received an influx of divine light unlike anything I have ever felt. It completely changed my energetic vibration - it was as though I was being bathed in divine white light. My clarity, focus, purpose and sense of peace have been amplified as a direct result of this extraordinary energy. It's powerful stuff! Life changing." - Rachael Cox "I never felt so connected to my body, mind and soul. I highly recommend Sky for everyone who is seeking answers and awakening for this new world." - Sth√©fanie Zacharias "Since my first session, I've experienced more energy, feelings of happiness and everything feeling wonderful. It has helped me to manifest my goals and even relieved pain I have had for a long time in my body." - Heidi Lude ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû How often can I join Kundalini Activation? Kundalini Activation with Sky Rivers allows you to activate Kundalini energy within you to transform your body and mind. To achieve a profound transformation with long-term effects, it is recommended to join Kundalini Activation regularly. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû About Sky Rivers Sky Rivers has guided many in their Kundalini awakening since 2018, facilitating more than 400 Kundalini Activation events, including weekend immersions and Kundalini facilitator training. As a Kundalini teacher and master practitioner of energy medicine, Sky specialises in energy healing, body-mind transformation and spiritual awakening. About Sky Rivers > ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû What to Bring / How to Prepare Please arrive at 6:45pm for a 7pm start. ** For the energy healing to be most effective, please do not eat 1-2 hours prior to the event. You can enjoy a light meal after the event.** ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû Price: Integrate your Kundalini Activation with Sky Rivers' Bliss Salt Bath (200g). Enjoy your salt bath in the evening before you go to sleep. ** Limited spots! Book in advance to secure your spot.** ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû 4-Week Journey: Join weekly to accelerate your body-mind transformation. With the 4-Week Journey, your session price is reduced to $55 AUD / session (total of $220). The 4-Week Journey gives you access to 4 journeys (1 Wednesday session per week) and expires after 4 consecutive weeks. Sessions are non-transferable. ÔΩûìÇÄÔΩû Video Testimonials "There is some kind of power that happens in the session. It‚Äôs like you're regaining an aspect of yourself, each time you have one of these experiences. You may not know what it is consciously but the week that follows you‚Äôll start to feel that whatever happened in the session is integrating into your life. I feel more empowered as myself where I feel what I have to say or how I feel is more valued and that it is important and that I can speak up and stand my ground." - Fenda R. Ashworth ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a very happy journey. But your mind is always trying to interfere. That‚Äôs the whole concept of, I think, Kundalini or meditation as well. Just not to pay attention to your mind. I think this was the reason why it didn‚Äôt work the first time. I was too much in my head. I just didn‚Äôt surrender. But once you surrender and just let it go, it‚Äôs amazing.‚Äù ‚Äì Tomek "I got stuck with transforming my body at one point. So I did some fitness modelling, and I couldn‚Äôt get my body to the level I wanted to, and I was pushing too hard. I was stressing my body, so there was a complete disconnect between my mind and how my body was feeling and healing. I feel like a cloud that‚Äôs been blocking me has been lifted. I think freedom is what I‚Äôve been searching for for so long. So to have that kind of healing has been very transformative." - Ashley Hudson ‚ÄúIt was right around the time when I was doing the Kundalini Activation in fact that I came to understand that a large component of my posture was a psychosomatic problem. I'm at least about 75% on the way to full posture correction now, you know, after 30 years of trying." - Philip Haines ‚ÄúWe get stuck in the grind of what we‚Äôre trying to achieve and the way we‚Äôre trying to live our lives. But what Kundalini does is it comes in and strips a lot of those beliefs away. You start to ask yourself questions like ‚ÄòWhy are we here?‚Äô. The feelings of joy and gratitude and whatnot are really quite intense. I think, experiencing those sensations, emotions and feelings really opens you up to everyday life.‚Äù ‚Äì Josh
Title: Kundalini Activation with Sky Rivers - A Shamanic Sound Healing Journey
Subtitle: Join Sky Rivers for an immersive shamanic sound bath and Kundalini Activation for energy healing, transformation and spiritual awakening.

Description: Chef Miska (pronounced Mishka) will lead you through the techniques and recipes for some truly delightful Croatian classic dishes from the Southern coastal areas of Dalmcija (Dubrovnik and Split) to the Northern cooler climates of Zagreb, Rijeka and the greater Istian region. Dishes include: Octopus Salad - Dalmcijan Style, Cobanac (Three Meat Ragu), Polenta - Pecorino, Pasticada - Rich Beef Ragu with Gnocchi, Brodet - Seafood Casserole, Sarma - Veal & Pork Stuffed Cabbage, Kupus - Potato and Garlic Cabbage (condiment) and many others given seasonal availability. All ingredients and equipment supplies, no experience necessary. Classes limited 4-6, Min 4 to run the class. Aged 18+
Title: CROATIAN DELIGHTS TO COOK AT HOME - A JOURNEY THROUGH CROATIA
Subtitle: A simple but delicious 3 dish meal to delight your family and friends. No special skills needed, just a willingness to jump in!

Refund_Policy: No Refunds
Description: Gentle to Progressive HATHA YOGA Classes: Wednesday mornings Outline: Yoga classes are set amidst the inspiring natural environment of Wylie's Baths with sweeping ocean views under the shelter of the Yoga space marquee including sun and shade options. This one hour Yoga class takes place on Wednesday mornings. BYO Everything: Please bring all your own Yoga and personal needs. Yoga Mat, Coverings etc as shared items may not be available. Early arrival is Important: While most classes may typically have more than ample space available, this is not guaranteed. To be more certain, a place may only be reserved through your own early arrival and mat placement. For example, arriving at least 10 minutes early is suggested to place your mat on an empty space, so as to reserve your spot. This is the reservation system for this class. This may be especially important during the potentially busier summer season and for the more popular 9am class. Shared use Yoga space: In attending the class please be prepared to share the space equitably and cooperatively to assist in accomodating others who may also be seeking to attend. Please respect other people's personal property including mat placement by not moving other people's belongings. Please kindly request any slight adjustment where needed. In most classes, even in the more popular summer months there is typically ample space available for everyone - however this can not be guaranteed. Shared use Public facility: This unique venue is a popular heritage community shared use facility which includes a range of activities in other adjacent areas in proximity to the Yoga space. This includes: Swimming within the ocean pool in front and below; Social getherings with family and friends; Meals and beverage outlet; Change-rooms for swimmers; Other similar or related activities. There may be audible conervsations and activities from time to time. In rough weather and at high tide or during storms the sounds of nature may predominate. You may at times need to focus more carefully towards listening and understanding the words of the Yoga teacher, or you may need to observe more closely any demonstration being provided for a practice. Weather & Year round practice: This sheltered Yoga space faces the warm morning sunshine. The marquee shelter has additional sides which are attached towards winter. On fine days some of the practices may be taken into the adjoining, more open outdoor space. During wet weather our Yoga practices continue under the shelter of the Yoga space marquee. Please note that in wet and very windy weather the wooden deck may become a little damp and breezy so a waterproof yoga mat and warmer clothing is important. Attendance and self care in practice: The classes are available for those without previous Yoga experience (beginners) as well as to those who are more experienced. Where there is attendance with mixed experience there will be guidance towards adapting ones practice accordingly. Note that practicing carefully within ones level of fitness, health and ability is important and is strongly encouraged. You are encouraged to practice gently and to reduce the effort and / or range of movement and to stop and rest at any time where needed so as to make the practice safe and useful. Those who are fitter and familiar with the practice may choose to work more strongly. Working within ones abilities is essential for safe practice and progressive useful development. Venue use: Entry to the Venue is for the Yoga Class only and any very early arrival or extended stays or use of pool or other facilities will require payment of the normal separate and additional venue entry fee at the Wylie's entry gate. Please enquire with Wylie's Baths Management for details. Booking Conditions: The information provided on this Eventbrite page and related Emails and on the YOGA NATURE Website and Notices constitute the Booking Terms and Conditions. On making a Booking you are confirming that you have read, understood, agreed to and that you will comply with these Terms and Conditions. You agree to obtain clarification with YOGA NATURE on any significant requirement as necessary. This event is organised by YOGA NATURE and your booking includes only the requested YOGA NATURE Classes at your nominated time and date. The Booking is not refundable so please make your selection carefully. The Booking is not transferable, exchangeable or interchangeable with activities, events, classes or services offered by others. The classes may only be attended by the person Booked. Inclusivity: Classes are broadly inclusive and welcoming to people across Multi- Generational/Ability/Experience/Familiarity - Backgrounds and Levels. For example, classes may include Adults, Seniors, Children. Children must be accompanied by an adult that is present at all times, with Children and Adult both booked and both participating at their own pace during the class. The level of participation one chooses is optional to cater for one's own individual needs, including practicing only when one considers it to be suitable and safe to do so under one's own current circumstances and conditions. For example, at times some attendees may be recovering from an injury or past illness or may be experiencing longer-term conditions. Some attendees may choose to engage in only the very gentlest of practices and may for example elect to rest in a deeply relaxed position for some of the time. Others attendees may elect to practice much more strongly or dynamically or energetically where suitable and safe to do. In attending you are agreeing to be fully responsible for your own safe practice including following any professional medical advice you have received related to exercising only in the manner prescribed and only where suitable. At times, some or all of the practices may be unsuitable. Learning Yoga practices can at times require some patience and a willingness to begin to slow down. Practice is supported by listening carefully to guidelines and instructions and to your own body. Attending several classes will support a more gradual progression of understanding and development at a more relaxed pace and is a more likely path towards meaningful wellbeing and health benefits. IMPORTANT & ESSENTIAL: HEALTH, CARE, SAFETY Fitness, Health & Medical Condition Check: You are most welcome to attend classes provided you have been medically advised that Yoga is suitable for your own particular circumstances and conditions. Please ensure that you have consulted with appropriate professional medical practitioners before making a Booking. COVID SAFETY: Normal COVID precautions current at the time of attendance are applicable as well as any special precaution required by YOGA NATURE and the Venue Management. You agree to check and be responsible for meeting these requirements. For Further details refer to NSW HEALTH; YOGA NATURE Web site (PARTICIPATION PAGE); The YOGA NATURE Teacher; Wylie's Venue Management for all notices, guidance and instructions. ENQUIRIES: Kindly please use the CONTACT PAGE on the YOGA NATURE website YOGA NATURE Web site: https://www.yoganature.org/
Title: 9am HATHA YOGA CLASS: Wylies Baths Coogee
Subtitle: HATHA YOGA Classes: Gentle stretches and progressive stronger practice options, experiential awareness, self-care, relaxation, meditation

Description: Framed for murder, Richard Hannay leaves behind a glamorous (yet entirely dull) life of race meets and parties, and goes on the run; A journey that takes him from his comfortable London flat, across the chilly moors of Scotland, and brings him face to face with a murderous spy ring. As trusted allies become enemies, and nemeses become close friends (or maybe something more?) is anyone really who they seem? And who can Richard trust? Suspense that will have you on the edge of your seat‚Ä¶until you‚Äôre falling off it with laughter, this is Hitchcock as you‚Äôve never seen it before. Hot off the success of sold-out Much Ado About Nothing, Blinking Light invites you to immerse yourself in the world of Hitchcock‚Äôs classic film The 39 Steps. Descend below the streets of Sydney to the sinister world of 1935 London, and kick back with a stiff drink as this thrilling caper unfolds around you. Founded by Izabella Louk, Blinking Light is a Gadigal-based theatre company dedicated to creating bold works of theatre that build community, spread joy, and further the fight against climate change by utilising environmentally sustainable theatre practices. To follow along with this thrilling adventure, or to find more information about Blinking Light, visit @blinkinglight.theatre on instagram. Weekday Sessions Doors 6.30pm Show 7.30pm Friday Early Session Doors 5.00pm Show 6.00pm Friday Late Session Doors 8.00pm Show 9.00pm Our events are proudly supported by City of Sydney.
Title: The 39 Steps
Subtitle: Suspense that will have you on the edge of your seat‚Ä¶until you‚Äôre falling off it with laughter, this is Hitchcock as you‚Äôve never seen.

Description: Are you alone? Is life making you lonely‚Ä¶ well you can always join us for A Marvellous Party at The Emerald Room, where every night is our birthday and you‚Äôre all invited! Once an auto body shop, now Sydney‚Äôs most salacious supper club, filled to the brim with sensational showgirls, exquisite jaw-dropping acrobatics, spine tingling live vocals and an ever rotating cast of the world‚Äôs greatest entertainers. Park yourself for the night and let the debauchery of our bodyshop of delight unfold and undress around you. SHOW ONLY & DINNER SHOW PACKAGES DURATION OF SHOW APPROX 200 MIN M15+ DINNER & SHOW FOR TABLES UP TO TWO [$150pp + BF] The Emerald Room show plus 3 course meal. DINNER & SHOW FOR TABLES OF THREE OR FOUR [$150pp+ BF] The Emerald Room show plus 3 course meal. CHAMPAGNE & OYSTER PACKAGE [$110pp + BF] The Emerald Room show plus a glass of champagne and 3 oysters. A selection of additional food and beverages available a la carte. CHAMPAGNE PACKAGE FOR TWO [$260 + BF] The Emerald Room show for two plus a bottle of champagne to share. A selection of additional food and beverages available a la carte. VIP BOOTH UP TO FOUR [$800 + BF] The Emerald Room show plus 3 course meal and a bottle of Moet & Chandon Champagne shared amongst up to 4 people in one of our luxurious catwalk booths with the best view in the house. VIP BOOTH UP TO SIX [$1100 + BF] The Emerald Room show plus 3 course meal and a bottle of champagne shared amongst up to 6 people in one of our luxurious catwalk booths with the best view in the house. For groups greater than contact us. SHOW ONLY [$80pp + BF] The Emerald Room show. A selection of food and beverages available a la carte. Wanting more? We've swapped the hubcap for ‚ÄúNightcap‚Äù in our late night service for risque rascals. A sumptuous menu of food, drinks and entertainment will continue the night into the wee hours. Whether you're a local or visiting Harbour City; there's no place like The Emerald Room. Kicking off at 10pm after the show.
Title: A Marvellous Party at The Emerald Room
Subtitle: Experience the glittering excitement of live entertainment & hospitality awaits you!

What to Expect link:https://cityswoon.com.au/howItWorksEvent.jsp?returnToPage=speed-dating-sydney-frank-macs-4960 We are very excited to be holding another one of our UNIQUE Matched Speed Dating events at one of Sydney's hottest cocktail bars - the award-winning Frank Mac's in The Rocks! The Event - Experience a series of relaxed mini-dates selected for you each round by an intelligent algorithm live at the event. - Hosted by a friendly and professional team. - Handpicked, top bar with a welcoming atmosphere. - Connect freely with your mutual matches the next day on CitySwoon. - Opportunity to connect with the other participants you don't date on the night. Description: Immerse yourself in a nurturing meditation and yoga session ‚Äì seasoned with poetry and enfolded in nature. Tix include $5 entry & donation to the Baths. Be guided to shift from 'thinking & doing' to 'feeling & being' in an immersive sensory experience that is Body Poetry Yoga. Stemming from the vinyasa and tantric yoga traditions, in this unique program you will reconnect with nature and in doing so remember your true nature - calm, centered and steady. These nurturing yoga sessions for women are held in the seaside women's sanctuary that is the McIver's Ladies Baths, Coogee ‚Äì the perfect spot for a post yoga dip! (pool entry included in ticket price) ‚Äã‚Äã  Sessions are for small groups only to allow for individual shiatsu assists. Each session includes pranayama breath practise, visualisation and a meditative vinyasa slow flow - for a strengthening, energising and relaxing experience. All levels are welcome but some yoga experience is beneficial. Sessions are tailored to the group. ‚Äãinessence nature yoga is an ideal antidote for anxiety and stress ‚Äì the perfect tonic to incorporate into your self care routine. SESSION TIMESWednesdays 7amFridays 7amSaturdays 8am (or 7am on hot days) Bookings are essential as places are limited.Sessions require minimum of 2 registrations to proceed. Please refer to Schedule for confirmed session times. EXCHANGE drop in - $30 (+ booking fee) Intro special - bring a friend for free - $35 + BF (for your first visit only) 5 class pass - $125 (see inessenceyoga.com for details) Fees include entry fee & donation to the Ladies Baths. Fee payable prior via eventbrite or cash/eft on the day (select pay on the day). CANCELLATIONS Cancellations require a minimum of 24 hours notice to allow for people on the waiting list to attend (as limited places). In the instance of wet weather, you will notified of the session's cancellation by email (no later than 1 hour prior) and your booking will be transferred to a future date of your choice. Thank you For more information: inessenceyoga.com www.mciversladiesbaths.com Contact: Kathy - inessencepoetry@outlook.com
Title: Seaside Yoga & Ocean Pool Swim for Women
Subtitle: Find your zen in a soulful seaside yoga flow at the McIver's Ladies Baths in Coogee, Sydney.

Description: It's not 1950 anymore! Most jobs today are "knowledge work", and you the boss? a big part of your job as the boss, is to teach, is to coach. And a big part of what you have to teach, is wisdom, insights, human nature, understanding of business. Good economy, bad economy, bad employees are dime a dozen. Good employees? Your business competitors are not only working on stealing your customers away from you, they are also working on stealing your best employees from you. You are competing against other employers to attract and keep high quality employees. And your best employees? In this knowledge based economy, best employees know the key to their own long term well-being is their own skill set. They are hungry for knowledge, for wisdom, they want what's in your head, and they want you to make their learning experience inspirational not painful. If you refuse to teach them, if you are not effective at coaching, or if it's unpleasant to learn under you (you are a typical tyrant of a boss from 1950 LOL) they will quit and go somewhere else for the learning experience. In this On Demand Webinar, we will address real challenges leaders face in the real world, but most training seminars can not and will not address. You will get real down to earth insights, zero corporate fluff! You will learn a whole new set of thinking, that are outside of your current "zone of thinking", you will hear things you've never heard of before, you will be equipped with skills that are new to you, so you can venture outside of your current comfort zone, and do things you've never done before, and get rewarded handsomely as a result of your new understanding, new thinking, new feeling, new actions. You will learn: And you want: In this 1 hour On Demand Webinar, you will learn insights and wisdom you've never heard of before, and benefit from your new coaching skills!  "After taking this class, I realized: I wasted my coaching effort on the wrong kind of employees! Don't make the mistake I made! Take this class, and learn which employees you should be coaching, and more importantly, which ones you should NOT!" "Now I know why my employees did not like my coaching: I always wanted to coach them at the worst possible time! It's not them - it's ME! LOL!! In this class, I learned how to identify the best timing for coaching! "The effectiveness of my coaching improved dramatically, after taking this class with Coach Michael Lin. He taught me exactly how to figure out the root of the "wrong thinking" within my employees that need improving, and how to turn my employees' "wrong thinking" 180 degrees, and have them thank me for it! You don't want to miss out on this class!" 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why we should not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? How we can constantly expand our comfort zone, by doing things we know we should do, but don't do - due to fear? +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is an Interview/Article by Coach Michael Lin on "Moving From Command & Control to Coaching & Collaboration: How Leaders and Managers Can Become Better Coaches - the Why, the What, and the How": https://medium.com/authority-magazine/moving-from-command-control-to-coaching-collaboration-michael-lin-on-how-leaders-and-managers-64fdf22eaa71 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a list of two dozen people telling us what they thought of the teaching, after they've attended the seminar or workshop by Coach Michael Lin: (These people range from brand new managers to highly experienced leaders, from various private sectors to the government...) https://youtu.be/_jPxflr1LV8 +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here is a short sample of Coach Michael Lin in action, helping managers to get over their fears and grow into Real Leaders, so they can do what they are afraid of doing but need to be doing: https://youtu.be/Wc4GylRBQ6U +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Here are over a dozen media interviews, in which Coach Michael Lin answers tough questions from journalists on leadership: https://www.linkedin.com/in/coachmichaellin/recent-activity/videos/ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ We have all attended those waste of time seminars that are: Why bring another one of those waste of time seminars to your company? And force employees to endure thru them? Be a real hero, bring a seminar that your employees will: And when leaders improve? everyone in the company gets to enjoy the benefit: from team members to shareholders! And all of them will be thanking you for organizing training that's useful!

If you are an expert, and you wish to remain an expert, doing the hands on work, then the above way is the way you should be thinking. But you are no longer just a hands on expert anymore, you have employees now, you are now an employer. You need to acquire a whole new set of thinking! The more you try to run away from this kind of problems, the more they chase you!!! "Short term pain but long term pleasure", or, "short term pleasure but long term pain", which one do you want? Description: About the Practice Beyond Meditations has created a unique blend of guided meditations, affirmations and visualisations designed to create positive change in your mind and body. It is the product of the personal growth work of Beyond Meditations founder, Kevin Ly. By using 'micro guided visualizations' you will learn to use the power of your imagination and intuition to achieve your goals, increase your creativity, lower anxiety and increase recovery. This is achieved from shifting peoples states by changing ones biochemistry through active breath work, mind and emotion from guided practices.  As a collective group and community, the space allows everyone to safely and comfortably drop into deep states of meditative experiences. This meta practice is a specially curated one, combining areas of Upa Yoga, Wim Hof Method, Oxygen Advantage by Patrick McKeown, Heartmath Intelligence and Dr Joe Dispenza. Learn more at www.beyondmeditations.com
Title: Beyond Meditations
Subtitle: Utilise, maximise and elevate the human potential through conscious breathwork and guided meditations.

Refund_Policy: No Refunds
Description: Shake up your usual weekly routine and join Altitude Tea's relaxing tea ceremony experience and spend a calming afternoon reconnecting to your inner self. Here is where you can let go of your mind and open up your heart to find peace, connection and clarity.  In this 90 minutes experience, you will embark on a serene journey where you will slow down and drink a variety of exotic high altitude grown teas. You will learn about the intricacies of different types of tea and how it can help your mind, body and soul. What's included in this experience: - A traditional tea ceremony using Gongfu set - Learn about the wisdom and philosophy behind each purposeful and measured movement. - Sampling of rare and exotic teas with over 30 varieties to choose from - Tips on how to drink tea mindfully - Learn how to appreciate taste and aroma through tea cupping -  Learn about the origins of each tea and cold brew - A sound bath meditation using a crystal singing bowl Discover the importance of mindfulness and how to be present in the moment by learning to drink tea properly at a tea ceremony guided by a tea expert.  In ceremony, tea becomes a wise and gentle guide, leading us to our highest selves and deepest peace.  You will leave this experience feeling refreshed and rejuvenated from deep within. If you're looking for things to do in Sydney that will help you unwind, this tea ceremony experience would be a great pick for you! This tea ceremony will be taken place at the Altitude Tea room in Waterloo. I can also bring this to you or your company :) About Altitude Tea Hi there I'm Cara, the founder of Altitude Tea. I started this tea brand in Sydney in 2014. I've been a life long tea drinker obsessed about tea quality, taste and getting the tea ceremony part down to a fine art. I have sampled over 1,000 varieties of tea during my life time from all corners of the world and I would like to share with with you the best of the best. Real quality rare and exotic teas grown on a high altitude and how you reach a peaceful state of mind through a tea ceremony experience.
Title: Mindful Tea Ceremony
Subtitle: Tea Ceremony is a mindfulness practice in being present in the moment and appreciating the simple things in life.

Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. Subtitle: Do you want to get ahead faster? Create loyalty from your employees? Have less stress? Have more time? This On Demand Webinar is for you!

Description: Before you had employees, all you had to do was to make sure you are a high performer yourself. You know why you wanted to get up early in the morning, fight traffic, and get to work. You now have employees. How do you get other people to want to produce high performance? How do get others to be as eager as you are? Everyone is "uniquely different", with their own set of reasons, their own set of whys: 200 people on the same airplane flying from Los Angeles to New York, they are going from Los Angeles to New York for 200 different reasons! You are going to New York for your own reasons. The other 199 passengers are also going to New York, but they are going for their own reasons. Same trip, same destination, different reasons. In just 1 hour, you will learn the skill to get your employees to Want to do what you Need them to do. This class is "On-Demand". As soon as you register, you will be able to attend the class. There is no need to wait. "I was frustrated when I couldn't get my employees to be as eager as me. After taking this class, I realized: I was trying to project my reasons and my whys onto my employees LOL other people are not me and they have their own reasons and their whys!" "I could not get my employees to tell me what they wanted until I took this class. Your business competitors are not only working on stealing your customers away from you, they are also working on stealing your best employees from you. You are competing against other employers to attract and keep high quality employees. And your best employees? In this knowledge based economy, best employees know the key to their own long term well-being is their own skill set. They are hungry for knowledge, for wisdom, they want what's in your head, and they want you to make their learning experience inspirational not painful. Description: Did you know, "Not All Millennials are like that!"? As a leadership coach, I've coached and trained 4 different types of Millennials... On a scale from 1 to 10, just exactly how frustrated are you, when it comes to managing millennials on your team? 11? or maybe 12? I am sorry: For your current employees who are millennials: You need to do/learn/hear what is necessary! And what you need to hear (not what you want to hear) are outside of your current awareness, they are outside of your current comfort zone. But you have a long history of expanding your comfort zone, right? You are not the sort of person who spends 100% of their intellectual, mental and emotional energy fighting to stay inside their comfort zone, are you? The type of person who insists on only hearing what they want to hear, and refuses to hear what they need to hear?  What do we call that kind of a person? A "Millennial"? :-) How did this happen? And what can you do to solve your challenge? 1. Exactly what is the pack of lies that were told to millennials; (No, it's not what you think.) 2. Who told this pack of lies, and what were their motives; (No, it's not who you think, and it's not what you think.) 3. What is the truth that millennials need to hear. (No, it's not what you think.) 4. What is the truth that you need to hear? As we say in Chinese: "Good medicine tastes bitter, honest advice sounds harsh to your ears." You already know "The Truth Shall Set You Free", but the truth will hurt your feelings first :-)  5. Why "Appeasement" is a really really bad policy, that will only turn you into an "Enabler", and harm everyone: your employees, the business, society at large and yourself. (Remember Neville Chamberlain and his disastrous policy of Appeasement?) 6. Why you must watch out for those who are trying to drive a wedge between employees and employers, or pit employees and employers against each other, instead of creating win/win situations for everyone. 7. How to figure out who need to be fired, and why you are actually harming them if you don't terminate them; 8. How to overcome your feeling of uneasiness to fire those who need to be fired, and why you are actually truly helping them by terminating them; 9. Who can be coached, and how to coach Millennials? And most importantly, you will learn how to establish a whole new narrative, how to present and control a new frame, so instead of you having to constantly appease, supplicate, pamper, and seeking approval from your bad employees with bad attitudes, you have the opposite: This class is ONLY for those managers who want to expand their own comfort zones, hear the truth, willing to do what has to be done, and want to overcome this challenge. You are busy, that's why this class is "On-demand"! As soon as you register, you'll be able to take the class! Or come back to the class if you get interrupted! 1: Delegation Skills for Busy Leaders - Why & How 2: How To Motivate & Inspire Your Employees? Young Employees? 3: How to Overcome Employee's Resistance To Change? 4: How to Create Genuine and Sincere Employee Loyalty? 5: How to Manage the 4 Different Types of Younger Employees? 6: How to Successfully Coach Your Employees? 7: Is being friends with your employees a good idea? or a bad idea? 8: How To Get Your Best Employees To Stay For As Long As Possible? 9: How To Avoid Costly Hiring Mistakes? 10: How to Overcome Your Anxiety with Discipline and Termination? 11: Seven Secrets for Your Leadership Success that They Won't Teach You! Thousands of business leaders, from hundreds of organizations and associations, in dozens of industries, have attended his Leadership Seminars, Workshops, Keynote Sessions & 1-on-1 Coaching sessions. His leadership seminar students love his unique teaching content, as well as his unique teaching method. He is the best, at: ‚óè Discovering what is in people's blindspot that is holding them back, causing internal conflicts deep down inside; ‚óè Effectively teaching his students new ways of understanding their situations, therefore helping them to resolve the conflicts in their thinking, so they can become more productive - instantly! +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ +++ Coach Michael Lin came out of the tech industry, and uses his superb analytical skills to dissect business challenges. He has deep insights into human nature, which he uses to help people to solve their business challenges. His analysis and solutions are all based on Emotional Intelligence, not on how we wish humans ought to be, but based on what humans actually are. Managers & Leaders from over 500 organizations across many industries have attended seminars and workshops taught by Coach Michael Lin. Example industries are: - Airports - Automobile Manufacturers - Aviation Companies - Banks & Credit Unions - Casinos - Charities - Churches - Courts (State and County) - Fire, Police & Sheriff Depts - Food Companies - Governments - Hospitals - Hotel Chains - Insurance Companies - Railroad Companies - School Districts - Technology Companies - Universities - Etc Etc. 1: What makes other people tick? Employees who report to us? Our peer managers & leaders? Outside customers? Outside vendors? Shareholders? Upper management? 2: How to identify the right incentives - for other people? Why we should not confuse ‚Äúthe right incentive for ourselves" with "the right incentive for others‚Äù? How to utilize our insights into short term vs long term pain & pleasure to influence, persuade and help others, to create Win/Win outcomes for everyone? 3: How to advance our own careers, by going out of our way to: help others?! solve other people's problems?! Why we need to understand the big picture of the corporation (not just "my department") and solve problems for the entire corporation? 4: "Software Upgrade" in our heads, from employee thinking (my hours for my salary), into business thinking: what do customers need and want? how to provide goods/services for customers? What hardware & human capabilities do we have? how to inspire employees to want to give their best - using non monetary incentives? How to create win/win for everyone? customers, shareholders, employees, and managers/leaders? 5: Why Confidence Building by practicing Fear Busting is the key to Self Development? Description: Art Masterclass is a premier, boutique art Studio, offering a mix of traditional craft workshops in Sydney. We are Australia‚Äôs first workshop to teach the art of traditional Turkish mosaic lamp making.  In this 2.5 hour class you will learn the techniques of this 500-year ancient craft. You will learn and practice assembling geometric patterning as well as techniques for laying the tiles (tesserae). Using your selected geometric template you will be guided to create your own traditional Turkish mosaic lamp!  All of our workshops & events include a sumptuous Turkish tea service, delectable treats & homemade Turkish shortbread cookies.  Our beautiful, and spacious studio is located in Darlinghurst, within a 5-minute walking distance to King Cross Station, and all the wonderful things that Sydney has to offer. After you have completed your mosaic lamp, reward yourself and catch a ferry across the sparkling Harbour to Manly or Watson‚Äôs Bay. Customised workshops are available, perfect for private functions, special welfare events, and corporate events. Gift vouchers are also available and is the perfect gift solution for family and friends. Classes are held everyday of the week, every week! So come along, bring a friend or group and join us for a fun filled workshop and take home your creative masterpiece! With our expertise and guidance we can help you unleash your inner creativity and discover your full artistic capabilities.

About PMI ACP Certification:  The PMI-ACP (Project Management Institute - Agile Certified Practitioner) certification stands as a globally acknowledged credential crafted to authenticate a professional's proficiency in Agile project management principles and practices. Offered by the esteemed Project Management Institute (PMI), it holds significant recognition in the project management domain. Ideal for individuals operating within Agile environments or seeking to transition their careers into Agile project management, the PMI-ACP certification is not confined to any specific Agile framework. Instead, it encompasses a diverse spectrum of Agile approaches, including Scrum, Kanban, Lean, XP (Extreme Programming), and more. Scroll down to view more schedules or visit organizer profile. Complete your enrollment on Eventbrite to receive instant confirmation. We offer weekdays and weekday classes every month in over 120 cities. Comprehensive 3-Day In-Person Classroom Training: Our program offers a rigorous three-day learning experience conducted in a physical classroom setting, facilitating direct interaction with experienced instructors and peers for collaborative learning. 2.	Authorized Courseware: The training utilizes official PMI-ACP courseware, covering essential Agile principles, tools, techniques, and practices necessary for success in the certification exam and practical application. 3.	Incorporation of PMBOK 7th Edition and Agile Practice Guide: Our training integrates the latest standards and best practices from the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) 7th Edition, alongside insights from the Agile Practice Guide published by PMI. 4.	Comprehensive Practice Tests: Participants receive access to practice tests and sample questions mirroring the actual exam, enabling them to evaluate their understanding and pinpoint areas for improvement. 5.	21 Contact Hours Certification: Successful completion of the program grants participants 21 contact hours, fulfilling the eligibility requirement to take the PMI-ACP certification exam. 6.	Guaranteed Success: Some training programs offer a pass guarantee, underscoring their confidence in the quality of instruction and course materials, motivating participants to excel in the certification exam. 7.	Application Support: Understanding the complexities of the PMI-ACP certification application, our training may offer application assistance, guiding participants through the requirements and ensuring all necessary documentation is provided. 8.	Post-Training Support: Even after the training concludes, participants may receive ongoing support, such as access to additional resources, clarification of concepts, or expert guidance, ensuring a seamless certification journey. Why Choose Us: 1.	Expert Instructors: Our certified PMI instructors with extensive industry experience will guide you throughout the program, ensuring an enriching learning journey. 2.	Practical Approach: We focus on real-world applications, allowing you to apply the concepts learned in the training to tackle actual business challenges. 3.	Interactive Learning Environment: Engage in stimulating discussions, collaborate with peers, and share best practices in a dynamic and supportive setting. 4.	Comprehensive Course Material: Gain access to a wealth of resources, study materials, and tools to enhance your understanding and preparation for the certification exam. For any query related to exam, location, course materials, etc. Please contact Daniel@certificaionplanner.com or visit www.certificationplanner.com  Who Should Attend: The PMI-ACP Training Program caters to a wide range of professionals, including project managers, Agile team members, IT professionals, business analysts, product managers, and project leaders, aiming to master Agile principles and achieve the PMI-ACP certification. Description: Lindesay - General Entry Come and enjoy a guided tour of the house and collection at Lindesay and discover the fascinating history of this classic Darling Point mansion. Built in 1834, Lindesay was the first house in Darling Point and the first in Australia to be built in the Gothic Revival style. Reminiscent of former times, Lindesay showcases restored Georgian interiors with fine antique English and Australian furniture. A new edition to the collection includes an exhibit of a children‚Äôs day nursery from that period. The house interiors are complemented by elegant, well-tended grounds with harbour views. Description:
Discover the story of Sydney on this expert-led walking tour, while hitting all of the city‚Äôs main attractions. Perfect for those who have just arrived, as well as locals and those who want to go deeper in learning about Australian history, culture, society & First Nations people.
 
 Starting from Customs House, you‚Äôll hear about Sydney‚Äôs colonisation by the British ‚Äì and how their arrival impacted the original inhabitants, the Cadigal people of the Eora nation.
 
 Your guide will provide you with a range of perspectives on Sydney‚Äôs development, introducing Aboriginal people, British governors, convicts & entrepreneurs, and other multicultural migrants, as you weave your way through the city centre.
 
 You‚Äôll also walk through part of The Rocks and finish at a popular brewery with harbour views of both the Bridge and the Opera House. At the end of the tour, your host will give you a custom-made map with heaps of recommendations to make the most of your time in Sydney: food, nightlife, art and much more ‚Äì stuff you won‚Äôt find in any guidebook!
 
 With a maximum of 12 guests, you‚Äôll be able to walk the streets in a small group so you‚Äôre not fighting to see, hear your guide or stay on the footpath.
 
 On this walk you‚Äôll visit, see and learn about:
 
 Please note: After booking we will send you a confirmation email with all the details - sometimes these end up in junk/spam folders so please look for an email from "justin@localsaucetours.com.au".

The Gallery‚Äôs exhibition program is designed to explore the richness and diversity of Australian art, both historical and contemporary, and present it in new contexts. The Gallery is renowned for encouraging research and promoting scholarly appraisal of artists from all periods of Australian art history. In addition, the S.H.
